Package comp3111.examsystem.entity.Questions

Class QuestionDatabase

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.tools.Database<Question>
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Questions.QuestionDatabase
public class QuestionDatabase extends Database<Question>
Database for accessing and storing question entity
Author:
Cheung Tuen King

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static QuestionDatabase getInstance()
      Access QuestionDatabase singleton
      Returns:
      QuestionDatabase singleton instance

    • filter

      public List<Question> filter(String question, QuestionType type, int score)
      Filter the question in the database based on parameters provided.
      Parameters:
      question - Question text for filtering. Perform fuzzy matching on this field. Do not perform filtering if this field is empty or null.
      type - Question type for filtering. Perform exact matching on this field. Do not perform filtering if this field is null.
      score - Score for filtering. Perform exact matching on this field. Do not perform filtering if this field is non-positive integer.
      Returns:
      List of questions matching the parameters

    • filter

      public List<Question> filter(String question, String type, String score) throws Exception
      Filter the question in the database based on parameters provided.
      Parameters:
      question - Question text for filtering. Perform fuzzy matching on this field. Do not perform filtering if this field is empty or null.
      type - Question type for filtering. Perform exact matching on this field. Do not perform filtering if this field is empty or null.
      score - Score for filtering. Perform exact matching on this field. Do not perform filtering if this field is non-positive, non-integer, empty or null.
      Returns:
      List of questions matching the parameters
      Throws:
      Exception - Score is not an integer

    • exist

      public boolean exist(long id)
      Check if the provided question ID exists
      Parameters:
      id - Question id for checking
      Returns:
      Boolean determining if the question ID provided exists

    • exist

      public boolean exist(Question question)
      Check if the provided question exists by checking its ID
      Parameters:
      question - Question for checking
      Returns:
      Boolean determining if the question provided exists

    • addQuestion

      public void addQuestion(Question question) throws Exception
      Validate and add the question provided to the database. Duplicated id will automatically change before adding. Duplicated questions, where the input question matched another question with all attributes same in database, is not allowed
      Parameters:
      question - Question for adding
      Throws:
      Exception - Duplicated question

    • updateQuestion

      public void updateQuestion(Question question) throws Exception
      Validate and update the question provided to the database
      Parameters:
      question - Question for updating
      Throws:
      Exception - Question id does not exist

    • deleteQuestion

      public void deleteQuestion(Question question, boolean deleteExam) throws Exception
      Delete the question from database
      Parameters:
      question - Question for deleting
      deleteExam - Whether exam containing question for deleting should be affected
      Throws:
      Exception - Question id does not exist, or certain exam is affected but cannot be updated according to deleteExam

    • deleteQuestions

      public void deleteQuestions(List<Question> questions, boolean deleteExam) throws Exception
      Delete a list of questions from database
      Parameters:
      questions - List of questions for deleting
      deleteExam - Whether exam containing question for deleting should be affected
      Throws:
      Exception - Question id does not exist, or certain exam is affected but cannot be updated according to deleteExam

    • deleteAll

      public void deleteAll() throws Exception
      Delete all questions from database. Affected exam will all be updated or deleted automatically. For testing purpose only.
      Throws:
      Exception - Question id does not exist
